title: Finance minister Sitharaman blames UPA for NPAs, write-offs 'not waivers' - Times of India
content: Finance minister Sitharaman blames UPA for NPAs, write-offs 'not waivers'  Times of India
description: India Business News: NEW DELHI: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Monday attacked the UPA regime for its alleged failure to recover money from those who turned their .
